title: GCS I/O: download video and upload bundle atomically
scope: Implement GCS download of input videos to a local working directory on the worker.
Upload the output bundle to a GCS prefix with atomic/consistent layout (no partial bundles).
Persist a small machine-readable run summary for portal ingestion.
acceptance: Worker can download `gs://...` video URI to a local path for processing.
Bundle upload writes to a temporary prefix then promotes/renames to final prefix (or equivalent atomic pattern).
A run summary JSON is written alongside outputs with ok/error and artifact paths.

deliverables.title: GCS I/O helpers and run summary writer
acceptance: GCS download/upload operations are encapsulated and error messages are actionable.
Run summary JSON includes mode, timestamps, and artifact locations.

subtasks.title: Implement download/upload helpers and atomic publish pattern.
done_when: gcs_io.py supports download of a single video object.
Upload publishes a complete bundle layout without partial visibility.
